item.title: Monitoring Linux Server with an Arduino
item.description: As usual I was so bored and wanted to build something cool on this weekend, So I ended up building an Arduino based Linux server monitoring solution for monitoring my Linux VPS.

item.title: Insecure Airtel wifi routers with MGMNT ssid
item.description: Some of the wifi routers (especially beetel models) provided by airtel broadband is paired with two SSIDs(Access point), One is an actual SSID for internet access and another one called MGMNT, which is used by airtel for maintenance / automatic configuration.

item.title: Update Raspberry pi firmware from Kali Linux
item.description: We can easily update Raspberry pi firmware in raspbian by running the command rpi-update, But in kali linux we dont have rpi-update command by default.
